mapper.insert: insert into employ_board (user_id, place, on_off, title, content) VALUES (#{userId},#{place},#{onOff}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employ_board
select E.board_id,E.on_off,E.place from employ_board E inner join need_equipment N on N.position_id=#{keyword} and N.board_id=E.board_id inner join position P on P.position_id=#{keyword}
select E.board_id, E.user_id, E.place,E.on_off, E.title,E.content, E.view_count,E.reg_date from employ_board E join user U on E.user_id=U.user_id where E.board_id=#{boardId}
